pr_title: ISPN-12095 CLI: Add support for cluster backup/restore

timeline.author: karesti

replies.bodyText: I don't think so, the only other implementation is PipelineResource which returns "" or false for all methods. Unfortunately it's not possible to use FileResource directly as the variable type, because aesh does not know how to set the value, resulting in a NPE being thrown.
replies.author: ryanemerson
